mapper.sql: id, message, send_user AS sendUser, reciver_user AS reciverUser, create_date AS createDate, message_type AS messageType, type
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.message, b.send_user AS sendUser, b.reciver_user AS reciverUser, b.create_date AS createDate, b.message_type AS messageType, b.type, a.nick_name as nickName, a.id AS userId FROM maple_user a, maple_message b WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND ( ( b.send_user = #{userId} AND b.reciver_user = #{friendId} ) OR ( b.send_user = #{friendId} AND b.reciver_user = #{userId} ) ) ORDER BY b.id LIMIT 20
